1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Animal Friendship
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Charm Person
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Create or Destroy Water
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: You either create or destroy water.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Cure Wounds
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Detect Magic
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Entangle
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Faerie Fire
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Fog Cloud
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Goodberry
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: Up to ten berries appear in your hand and are infused with magic for the duration.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Healing Word
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Jump
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Longstrider
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Purify Food and Drink
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Speak with Animals
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration.

1stLevelDruidSpells.Name: Thunderwave
1stLevelDruidSpells.Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw.
